GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.13 to before v4.19.257
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around netdev_budget.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.257 by commit c3d0b6b3c808ff7d5439fbe6a41108bbb000ab26, it was introduced in version v2.6.13 by commit 51b0bdedb8e784d0d969a6b77151911130812400. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around netdev_budget.
